talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>These river rafts are seriously damaged.<sp:0:4:0>They may be beyond repair. <sp:5:0:0>This could
present a problem.
talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I am only thinking in circles at this point.<sp:5:0:0>
I will consider the problem again at dawn.
talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The rafts are damaged. We are unsure 
how to proceed. <sp:5:0:0>We will reconsider the
problem at dawn after resting.
